section1.paragraph: Our data-driven solution for smart planning and unlock the secrets of Abruzzo tourism
section1.label: Get started

section2.title: About Nomad
section2.paragraph: Nomad is our solution linked to the world of tourism that monitors the tourist flows of Abruzzo, starting from official ISTAT datasets. It provides statistics and  future forecasts based on a trained Machine Learning model.
section2.label: Find out more

section3.title: Titolo
section3.paragraph: We designed Nomad starting from an idea: to guide the user on a journey to better understand the data of tourist flows in Abruzzo, making his experience interactive and enjoyable.

div1.title: User friendly
div1.paragraph: Nomad has an intuitive interface and an attractive visual design. We have implemented interactive graphs and a tutorial, to make its functionality more accessible and to focus the user on data visualization.

div2.title: Reliable
div2.paragraph: All data comes from official ISTAT datasets. Nomad therefore guarantees the accuracy and quality of the statistical information.

div3.title: Powerful
div3.paragraph: Despite the large amount of data taken into analysis, we implemented a series of optimizations that have made Nomad performing and effective. This was also possible thanks to the use of cutting-edge technologies, such as the machine learning model to calculate forecasts.

introduction.paragraph: Charting a new course in the digital realm

div1.title: WHO WE ARE
div1.paragraph1: Outlander is a web agency in Turin specialising in the creation of cutting-edge sites and web applications.
div1.paragraph2: The company was born from a team of developers and designers determined to transform their passions into solutions for individuals and companies, conceived one by one with creativity and an out-of-the-box approach.
div1.paragraph3: The word outlander conjures up the idea of an exploration into innovative solutions, created to satisfy the customer and accompany him or her on a voyage of discovery into the digital frontier.

div2.title: OUR FOCUS
div2.paragraph1: We deal with web solutions for individuals and companies related to the tourism sector.
div2.paragraph2: Our focus includes innovation and User Experience, and with these pillars we offer tailored solutions to meet customer needs.
div2.paragraph3: All Outlander projects and solutions include a careful analysis of the UX and the UI, a Mobile First development and SEO optimization.

div3.title: OUR TECHNOLOGIES
div3.paragraph1: A journey to discover the digital age, guided by innovative technology and experience.

div4.paragraph1: It is our latest project, a web application that allows the user to explore the Abruzzo region like never before.
div4.paragraph2: With a user-friendly interface, NOMAD analyzes ISTAT datasets and creates interactive charts that provide the user with a detailed look at tourist flows and their choices, from the type of accommodation to the most popular provinces. NOMAD is the ideal solution that guarantees reliability and data accuracy.
div4.paragraph3: In addition, with a trained machine learning model, NOMAD proposes medium and long-term forecasts of future tourist flows, ensuring accuracy up to five years.
